description: The Trango TRK GTX combines the advanced technologies and climbing prowess typically found only in Mountaineering Boots, delivering a lightweight scrambler capable on and off the trail. Fully waterproof and designed to take a beating, the Trango TRK GTX can handle the toughest trails in any conditions. Minimal seams keep hotspots and blisters at bay while the Vibram® Mulaz outsole with a climbing zone platform provides dependable traction.
name: La Sportiva Trango TRK GTX - Mens

specs.value: Ortholite ® Hybrid with 5% recycled rubber + 15% production waste foam
